description: Variation of conditions 14 and 15 of planning permission dated 14th January 2014 (RN 13/06999/FULL) for the erection of an extension at roof level to provide a three bedroom flat and associated terraces. NAMELY,  to allow access to Terrace 07 for maintenance purposes only,  installation of solar control privacy window film to windows facing lightwell and to allow transparent glazing to north facing elevation.
